p: For the observational series, trends were calculated both for the 1970–2005 ( N = 36) interval of overlap with the CMIP5 historical simulations, and for the longer 1970–2015 ( N = 46 years) updated to include the most recent decade of observations. In both cases, p values were assessed by taking into account reduced degrees of freedom owing to serial correlation of regression residuals via N’ = N(1 − ρ)/(1 + ρ) where ρ is the lag-one autocorrelation coefficient of the actual series ( Table 1).
